plants.name: Nettle
plants.description: Stinging nettle is a nutritious plant popular in Western herbal medicine. Studies suggest that it may reduce inflammation, hay fever symptoms, blood pressure and blood sugar levels â€” among other benefits. While fresh stinging nettle may cause irritation, cooked, dried or freeze-dried stinging nettle is generally safe to consume.

plants.name: Chamomile
plants.description: Camomile is a flowering plant in the daisy family. It has been used for centuries to treat a variety of ailments. It is a popular herbal remedy for anxiety, insomnia, and digestive problems. It is also used to treat skin conditions, such as eczema and psoriasis.

plants.name: Peppermint
plants.description: Peppermint is a hybrid mint that is native to Europe and North America. It is a popular flavoring in foods and beverages, and it is also used as a medicinal herb. Peppermint oil is used to treat nausea, vomiting, irritable bowel syndrome, and other conditions.

plants.name: Lavender
plants.description: Lavender is a flowering plant that is native to the Mediterranean region. It is a popular herb used in aromatherapy and herbal medicine. It is also used as a flavoring in foods and beverages. Lavender oil is used to treat anxiety, insomnia, and other conditions.

plants.name: Rosemary
plants.description: Rosemary is a flowering plant that is native to the Mediterranean region. It is a popular herb used in cooking and as a flavoring in foods and beverages. It is also used as a medicinal herb. Rosemary oil is used to treat anxiety, depression, and other conditions.

plants.name: Thyme
plants.description: Thyme is a flowering plant that is native to the Mediterranean region. It is a popular herb used in cooking and as a flavoring in foods and beverages. It is also used as a medicinal herb. Thyme oil is used to treat coughs, colds, and other conditions.

plants.name: Sage
plants.description: Sage is a flowering plant that is native to the Mediterranean region. It is a popular herb used in cooking and as a flavoring in foods and beverages. It is also used as a medicinal herb. Sage oil is used to treat coughs, colds, and other conditions.

plants.name: Oregano
plants.description: Oregano is a flowering plant that is native to the Mediterranean region. It is a popular herb used in cooking and as a flavoring in foods and beverages. It is also used as a medicinal herb. Oregano oil is used to treat coughs, colds, and other conditions.
